column2: an A.M. Eatery////Sometimes I call in a "to go" order
column3: but about half the time they mess that up. Today I put in a "to go" order
column5: they had no record of my order -- they just lost it. So I had to put in my order again in person
column7: I'll call to put in an order
column8: and they simply won't answer the phone -- they're just too busy to get to it. Other times
column10: I get home to learn that the order is wrong in some way.
